subject: Re: Team photo-UPDATE!
preview: Hi Megan, Great news, we have updated the hero image. You can see the updates here: https://littlealliedhealth.com.au/about-us/meet-our-team/https://allears.com.au/why-us/meet-our-team/

full_threads.body:
Hi Megan, 

Great news, we have updated the hero image. You can see the updates here: 
https://littlealliedhealth.com.au/about-us/meet-our-team/
https://allears.com.au/why-us/meet-our-team/

Hi @chris done

https://littlealliedhealth.com.au/about-us/meet-our-team
https://allears.com.au/why-us/meet-our-team/

- create a new hero/banner
- increase the height of image and the section in elementor

@jaime looks great, thanks. 
Can I please ask for the following:
https://littlealliedhealth.com.au/about-us/meet-our-team/
1. increase height to show faces on top row.
2. increase height to show faces on bottom row. 

https://allears.com.au/why-us/meet-our-team/
1. Increase height to show bottom row

Hi @ricaV2 Updates completed

✅ Can we also update the photo collage as some old staff still feature in this

https://littlealliedhealth.com.au/about-us/meet-our-team/
https://allears.com.au/why-us/meet-our-team/

Time: +15mins

Fantastic- thank you 😊

Can we also update the photo collage as some old staff still feature in this, other than that- all looks good 😊

Thank you

Megan

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia
Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Active

full_threads.body:
Hi Megan, 

Great news, we have finished with the updates on the team pages for both All Ears and Little Allied Health. You can see the updates here: 
https://littlealliedhealth.com.au/about-us/meet-our-team/
https://allears.com.au/why-us/meet-our-team/

If you happen to not see the updates, please clear your cache as your computer/device may be displaying an older version of the page.

Hi @chris updates completed in littlealliedhealth team page
https://littlealliedhealth.com.au/about-us/meet-our-team/

Time: +10mins @ricaV2

hi @jaime, the resize looks great.

The https://littlealliedhealth.com.au/about-us/meet-our-team/ page is yet to have the team members updated. Can you please review the original instructions and update? thanks.

Hi @chris done fixing team column sizes
https://allears.com.au/why-us/meet-our-team/

Time: +5mins @ricaV2

Hi @jaime All Ears looks great, we still need to complete the updates for https://littlealliedhealth.com.au/about-us/meet-our-team/

Further update:
Can we please ensure the profile images are the same size regardless of the number of staff? At the moment, the image size scales with team member count and results in visual imbalance.

Hi @ricaV2 

Done on the following updates

✅ Remove
✅ Grace from the Leadership Team, she can just be under Psychology

✅ Add
✅ Megan Marotti, Practice and Communications Manager

✅ Remove
✅ Sardi Aworth (I dont see sardi aworth in the team list, I think its already removed)
✅ Add - Olivia Howard, Clinical Support Officer

✅ Add
✅ Thomas Hodge

✅ Remove
✅ Victoria McKinnon
✅ Jess Goc-Ong

✅ Add

✅ Jess Kari

Time: +25mins

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hi Rika,

Can you please help me with some team updates on:

https://allears.com.au/ & https://littlealliedhealth.com.au/

The images can be found here: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/mg8r5zrjic7qg0n/AAAs5ygBXOEy3C9lQfmZWvRHa?dl=0

We need to ensure the scale matches the existing photos.

Thanks!

Hi Chris

Thank you for chatting to me yesterday about our logo/website changes. I look forward to working further on this.

As discusses can you please update our team photos/titles as per below:

Leadership team:

Remove
Grace from the Leadership Team, she can just be under Psychology

Add
Megan Marotti, Practice and Communications Manager

Clinical Support team:

Remove
Sardi Aworth
Add
Olivia Howard, Clinical Support Officer

Audiology team:

Add
Thomas Hodge

Speech Pathology Team:

Remove
Victoria McKinnon
Jess Goc-Ong

Add
Riya Ajani Ponnudurai
Jess Kari
Tamsin Coleman

I am still yet to gather bio’s on each new staff member but will get this to you soon.

Thank you
Megan Marotti
Practice & Communications Manager (She / Her)

Our team is committed to maintaining and promoting a child safe environment.
I live and work on Kaurna Country and pay my respect to Elders past and present
